data.title: Football Italia
data.text:
Official: Inter terminate Eriksen contract

Inter have announced the termination of Christian Eriksen's contract with an official statement on their website. "FC Internazionale Milano can confirm that an agreement has been reached to terminate Christian…

Napoli release injury update ahead of Milan clash

Napoli star Lorenzo Insigne continued to train separately from the group today, same as Fabian Ruiz and Kalidou Koulibaly. The Azzurri are preparing for Sunday's key Serie A clash against…

Inter prepare to say goodbye to Eriksen with farewell event

Inter have reportedly reached an agreement to terminate Christian Eriksen's contract and are preparing an even at the Stadio Meazza to say goodbye to the Denmark international. Inter will announce…

Cavani set to snub Juventus, join Barcelona

According to reports in Argentina, former Napoli striker Edinson Cavani is unwilling to join Juventus as he prepares to move to Barcelona, where he would replace Sergio Aguero. Cavani sees…

Bremer’s Torino future up in the air amid Milan and Chelsea interest

Gleison Bremer's is facing an uncertain future at Torino, with President Urbano Cairo admitting that the defender will 'stay with us for this season.' Bremer, 24, sees his contract expires…

Inter send message to Tottenham over star duo

Tottenham are interested in Stefan de Vrij and Marcelo Brozovic and Inter director Piero Ausilio provided updates on both players in his last interview with Sky Sport Italia. Brozovic sees…

Insigne makes Manchester City admission, discusses conflicts with Napoli fans

Napoli captain Lorenzo Insigne admits he enjoys watching Pep Guardiola's Manchester City and adds that somebody doesn't understand him in Naples. The 31-year-old sees his contract expire at the end…

Allegri: ‘January transfer window won’t solve Juventus’ problems’

Massimiliano Allegri insists the January transfer window won't solve Juventus problems and reveals Kaio Jorge could start against Bologna tomorrow. The Bianconeri sit seventh in the Serie A table, eight…

Bastoni on ‘idol’ Sergio Ramos, Jorginho’s penalties and difference between Conte and Inzaghi

Inter defender Alessandro Bastoni reveals Sergio Ramos' present for his birthday and insists Jorginho should be Italy's dedicated penalty kick taker. The Italy international spoke about the Nerazzurri's campaign in…

Official: dates and times for Italy’s Nations League games revealed

The dates and times for Italy's Nations League matches have been announced, with the Azzurri making their debut against Germany and returning to Wembley to face England on June 11.…

Milan have Giroud hope amid injury crisis in attack

According to multiple reports in Italy, Olivier Giroud should return to group training today and be available to face Napoli on Sunday. The 35-year-old has missed Milan's last five games…

‘Done deal’: Inter beat Barcelona to signing Onana

Andre Onana has a verbal agreement with Inter and is set to join the Nerazzurri as a free agent despite Barcelona's interest, it's reported. Onana had been linked with both…

Inter director Ausilio ‘would sign Lukaku again’ but only on one condition

Inter director Piero Ausilio admits he would sign Romelu Lukaku again 'but only on loan' and confirms the Nerazzurri were in talks to sign Marcus Thuram in the summer. Lukaku…

Unhappy Man United striker Martial open to joining Juventus

According to La Gazzetta dello Sport, Manchester United striker Anthony Martial is open to joining Juventus in January, with the Bianconeri considering a loan move. The Frenchman has struggled with…

Probable line-ups: Lazio vs. Genoa and Salernitana vs. Inter

Lazio return to the pitch after last week's defeat against Sassuolo, while Inter travel to Salernitana. Check out the probable line-ups for today's matches. We begin at 17.30 UK time…

Coppa Italia Round of 16 fixtures: Napoli vs. Fiorentina stands out

The Coppa Italia Round of 16 is now confirmed, with Lecce the only remaining Serie B side, while Napoli-Fiorentina, Milan-Genoa and Juventus-Sampdoria stand out. The second knockout phase was completed…

Serie A Preview | Salernitana vs. Inter: Top face bottom

New Serie A leaders Inter visit rock bottom Salernitana, who are in crisis both on and off the field, seeking a sixth straight win. Simone Inzaghi has if anything managed…

Coppa Italia: Sampdoria see off Torino for Juventus date

Sampdoria will face Juventus in the Coppa Italia Round of 16 after getting the better of Torino thanks to a splendid Valerio Verre volley. It was a game of penalties…

Serie A Preview | Lazio vs. Genoa: Sarri faces Shevchenko

Ciro Immobile is in doubt for Lazio with a stomach bug, but Genoa have Mattia Destro back and are boosted by a midweek Coppa Italia victory. The Biancocelesti could be…
